publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-420 Ross Finnie: The Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000—That the Rural Affairs Committee in consideration of the Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000, recommends that the Regulations be approved.

S1M-420 Ross Finnie: The Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000—That the Rural Affairs Committee in consideration of the Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000, recommends that the Regulations be approved.

S1M-420 Ross Finnie: The Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000—That the Rural Affairs Committee in consideration of the Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000, recommends that the Regulations be approved.
